title: Social Studies Technology-Integrated Instructional Design through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Technology integration training for pre-service teachers, emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities in resource-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply three or more appropriate digital tools to social studies lesson design
Learners can develop and implement lesson plans based on the TPACK model in blended learning environments
Learners can generate learner engagement analysis reports using smartphone-based assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
